page.title: 13THE DARWIN YOUTH CLUB
page.content: Mr. Stan Williams has been running the youth club for five years. He is a full time youth leader and he is paid by the Local Education Authority. The youth club is also financed by the L.E.A. who also pay for the decoration repair of the building and wages of 14 staff. The number of staff varies throughout the year. Extra money for pinball machines, running of the coffee bar, discos and trips has to be paid for from the club's own funds. These funds come from admissions and coin operated machines in the club. The club is open four times a week for young people from Breadsall and Chaddesden. Stan enjoys his work and on the whole the behaviour of the young people is good, but local residents are often critical of the teenagers' high spirits. {Cont. Page 14
